resources.string: Would you like to cancel the current VPN Connection?
In order to change the serverModel, please disconnect the VPN first
All of these serverModels are being provided by the VPN gate project and they are offering their service free of charge. You can read more about the VPN gate project at https://www.vpngate.net/en/

When you use our Service, our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data, as well as your options regarding that data, are outlined on this page. 

 We use your data to provide the Service and make it better. You consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy by using the Service. Terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, unless otherwise specified. 

 We place a high priority on maintaining your privacy. We hope that the following statement will help you understand how our app handles personal identifiable information (also known as "PII") that you may occasionally provide to us through the Internet (the Google Play Platform). 

 When you download our Android applications, we generally do not collect any personal information from you. To be more specific, we do not require users to register before downloading the application, nor do we keep track of their visits to our application; in fact, we do not even have a server on which such personal information could be stored. 

 Information Collection and Utilization Log Data 

 We would like to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in the event of an error in the app, we collect data and information called Log Data from third-party apps on your phone. The IP address of your device, the name of your device, the version of your operating system, the app's configuration when you use our service, the time and date of your use of the service, and other statistics may be included in this log data. 

 Cookies are small data files that are frequently used as anonymous unique identifiers. Cookies These are stored in the internal memory of your device and are sent to your browser from the websites you visit. 

 These "cookies" are not used explicitly by this Service. On the other hand, the app might make use of libraries and third-party code that make use of "cookies" to gather data and enhance services. You are informed whenever a cookie is being sent to your device and have the option to accept or reject them. You may not be able to use some aspects of this Service if you reject our cookies. 

 Service Providers For the following reasons, we may employ individuals and businesses of third parties: 

 • To make our Service easier 

 • To act on our behalf and provide the Service 

 • To provide services related to the service 

 • To help us figure out how people use our Service. 

 Users of this Service should be aware that these third parties have access to your personal data. To carry out the responsibilities that have been assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are required to keep the information confidential and not use it for any other purpose. 

 When you use our Service, we may ask for certain personally identifiable information from you to improve your experience. We will keep and use the requested data in accordance with this privacy statement. 

 The app does make use of services provided by third parties, and these services may gather information that can be used to identify you. 

 Link to the privacy policies of third-party service providers used by the app Security We value your trust in us and strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting your personal information. However, keep in mind that neither electronic storage nor internet transmission is 100% secure, nor we cannot guarantee their absolute security. 


Links to Other Websites 

 This Service Might Provide Links to Other Websites You will be taken to that website if you click on a link from a third party. Please be aware that we do not control these external websites. As a result, reading these websites' privacy policies is highly recommended. We take no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services and have no control over them. 


Privacy for Children 

 These Services are not directed at children under the age of 13. Children under the age of 13 are not knowingly collected personally identifiable information by us. If we learn that a child under the age of 13 has given us personal information, we delete it right away from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and are aware that your child has given us personal information, please get in touch with us so that we can take the necessary steps.


 Changes to This Privacy Statement From time to time, we may update this Privacy Statement. As a result, you should check this page frequently for updates. By publishing the updated Privacy Policy on this page, we will notify you of any changes.
